name: Space Attack Force
description:
A relatively simple shooter game I made over the course of 2 weeks. Shoot the ships that come from the bottom of the screen and hope they don't get behind you since you can't shoot that way for some reason

CONTROLS

---------

Move - Mouse

Shoot - Left Click

NOTE: Since this is my first main project and game published on itch in general, it might be a bit buggy, any game crashes are likely due to 1 specific bug I was wracking my head for hours on and couldn't solve but mostly patched out, so word of warning.
